entities.name: wands
entities.description: The wands are mentioned as being ready to strike, indicating they are a crucial part of the duel.

entities.name: duelers
entities.description: The duelers are described as weaving and darting, making it difficult for them to cast curses without hurting their own side.

entities.name: Peeves
entities.description: Peeves is mentioned as zooming over the duelers, dropping Snargaluﬀ pods onto the Death Eaters.

entities.name: Snargaluﬀ pods
entities.description: The Snargaluﬀ pods are described as being dropped by Peeves onto the Death Eaters.

entities.name: Death Eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned as having their heads engulfed in wriggling green tubers.

entities.name: tubers
entities.description: The tubers are described as hitting the Cloak over Ron's head and being suspended in midair.

entities.name: Cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is mentioned as being hit by a fistful of tubers.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is described as trying to shake off the damp green roots from his head.

entities.name: Elder Wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is mentioned in a separate section of the text.

entities.name: Dean
entities.description: Dean is described as knocking out a masked Death Eater with a stunning Spell.

entities.name: Dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is mentioned as attempting to retaliate against Dean.

entities.name: Parvati
entities.description: Parvati is described as shooting a Body Bind Curse at Dolohov.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as yelling 'LET'S GO!' and gathering the others.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as gathering with Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Peeves zooms over the duelers, dropping Snargaluﬀ pods onto the Death Eaters.
Dean knocks out a masked Death Eater with a stunning Spell.
Parvati shoots a Body Bind Curse at Dolohov.
Harry gathers the others, including Ron and Hermione.
